title: cant log in (EUNE)
body:
just cant log in to the server in EUNE, it stack on "Logging in... loadin" pop up, until "connect failure" pops up.

1.I have no problems connecting to EUW whatsoever.
2.The guide i found from riot, doesnt help, and probably not even up to date, i have windows 10. and all the explanations there for win 8 or lower.

thanks in advance

replies.body:
Hmmm...it is always extremely odd when you are connect perfectly fine to one region, but not to the other.  At the end of the day, you are attempting to connect to two completely separate platforms, and for some reason your connection isn't able to establish properly with EUNE.  In an attempt to resolve this, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  

Feel free to reply back and let me know if you are still experiencing issues!
